fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Development and Cooperation, Agriculture, Environment, Climate change, Trade, Food safety
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: CABI is a not-for-profit international organization that improves people’s lives by providing information and applying scientific expertise to solve problems in agriculture and the environment. Our mission and direction is influenced by our member countries who help guide the activities we undertake. These include scientific publishing, development projects and research, and microbial services.
